Description: Rim sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black (fired reddish) below; part of faded rosette in added white outline with added red centres above two white bands; exterior: at rim, frieze of reversed S between narrow bands; below, painted decoration consisting of sphinx (part of head, hair with curlicue and shoulder remaining), to left.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0537) (phase 2)
